# UITitlebarToolbarStyle.unified

**Case**

A style indicating that the toolbar appears inline with the window title.

## Declaration

```swift
case unified
```

## Styles

- **UITitlebarToolbarStyle.automatic**: A style indicating that the system determines the toolbar’s appearance and location.
- **UITitlebarToolbarStyle.expanded**: A style indicating that the toolbar appears below the window title.
- **UITitlebarToolbarStyle.preference**: A style indicating that the toolbar appears below the window title with toolbar items centered in the toolbar.
- **UITitlebarToolbarStyle.unifiedCompact**: A style indicating that the toolbar appears inline with the window title and with reduced margins to allow more focus on the window’s contents.
